00015 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00016 GatherSurfaceVelocity<EvalT, Traits>::
00017 GatherSurfaceVelocity(const Teuchos::ParameterList& p,
00018                               const Teuchos::RCP<Albany::Layouts>& dl) :
00019   surfaceVelocity  (p.get<std::string> ("Surface Velocity Name"), dl->node_vector ),
00020   numVertices(0), worksetSize(0), numVecDim(0)
00021 {  
00022   this->addEvaluatedField(surfaceVelocity);
00023   this->setName("Gather Surface Velocity"+PHX::TypeString<EvalT>::value);
00024 }
00025 
00026 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00027 GatherSurfaceVelocity<EvalT, Traits>::
00028 GatherSurfaceVelocity(const Teuchos::ParameterList& p) :
00029   surfaceVelocity  (p.get<std::string> ("Surface Velocity Name"),p.get<Teuchos::RCP<PHX::DataLayout> >("Data Layout") ),
00030   numVertices(0), worksetSize(0), numVecDim(0)
00031 {
00032   this->addEvaluatedField(surfaceVelocity);
00033   this->setName("Gather Surface Velocity"+PHX::TypeString<EvalT>::value);
00034 }
00035 
00036 // **********************************************************************
00037 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits> 
00038 void GatherSurfaceVelocity<EvalT, Traits>::postRegistrationSetup(typename Traits::SetupData d,
00039                       PHX::FieldManager<Traits>& fm)
00040 {
00041   this->utils.setFieldData(surfaceVelocity,fm);
00042 
00043   typename std::vector< typename PHX::template MDField<ScalarT,Cell,Node, VecDim>::size_type > dims;
00044   surfaceVelocity.dimensions(dims); //get dimensions
00045 
00046   worksetSize = dims[0];
00047   numVertices = dims[1];
00048   numVecDim = dims[2];
00049 }
00050 
00051 // **********************************************************************
00052 template<typename EvalT, typename Traits>
00053 void GatherSurfaceVelocity<EvalT, Traits>::evaluateFields(typename Traits::EvalData workset)
00054 { 
00055   unsigned int numCells = workset.numCells;
00056   Teuchos::ArrayRCP<Teuchos::ArrayRCP<double*> > wsSurfaceVelocity = workset.wsSurfaceVelocity;
00057 
00058   for (std::size_t cell=0; cell < numCells; ++cell) {
00059     for (std::size_t node = 0; node < numVertices; ++node) {
00060       for (std::size_t dim = 0; dim < numVecDim; ++dim) {
00061         surfaceVelocity(cell,node,dim) = wsSurfaceVelocity[cell][node][dim];
00062       }
00063     }
00064   }
00065 
00066 
00067   // Since Intrepid will later perform calculations on the entire workset size
00068   // and not just the used portion, we must fill the excess with reasonable 
00069   // values. Leaving this out leads to calculations on singular elements.
00070   for (std::size_t cell=numCells; cell < worksetSize; ++cell) {
00071     for (std::size_t node = 0; node < numVertices; ++node) {
00072       for (std::size_t dim = 0; dim < numVecDim; ++dim) {
00073         surfaceVelocity(cell,node,dim) = surfaceVelocity(0,node,dim );
00074       }
00075     }
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 }
